title: gg wp community
body:
I am done trying to explain why ranked is NOT an accurate representation of a players ability to play league of legends, all I am ever getting from people is that the mathematics behind it are too complicated.

So you guys let me know when the blind are no longer leading the blind.

When the challenger player tells you to walk off a cliff and they walk off the cliff themselves, take a moment to think for yourself for a change, do not simply get excited and run full speed off that cliff.

This is a team game and the only way you will ever see a players ability to play is by actually seeing them play in a real 5v5 organised game. If that is too complicated for you then please learn to play league of legends underwater.

replies.body:
**Ranked isn't just a representation of players skill, but also a representation of overall ability to work as a team.** If you are able to play a wide range of champs in a wide range of roles (as well as play them well), you will climb. The trick is also communication (positive communication, i feel like you would be a flamer), communication with pings on the map and helpful and encouraging communication in team chat. 

Understand that you are in bronze (like me) and that *everyone there is probs gonna be mechanically under skilled*. What you have to focus on is taking objectives, seeing rotations and other shot calling, all while maintaining a positive attitude.

 *In bronze champ select everyone wants to carry*. To counter this, you should suggest some players play a different type of champion like a tank, mage, poke support, etc (but only if they are comfortable with it, don't force people) so that you actually have a good team comp and you will be surprised how many people will listen to you. 9/10 the enemy team will not have a good team comp to stand up against you. 


**On the plus side:**

* Your CS has improved
* Your KDA is somewhat improving 
* You have had some really good games

**Some things you could improve on as an individual:**

* Stop thinking you deserve a higher elo
* Look at you items and build orders so you can amplify champs natural power spikes
* Stop blaming everyone else

You have 120 wins in low bronze with a win rate of 49%, meaning that ***YOU*** need to improve your game in order to climb.

This is a team game.

How many can't understand this?

Apparently 99.9% of players think that in solo queue the games end result is determined by one person and not 10. Hence why they judge a player off their rank.

I have spent years trying to convince the community otherwise but when I start talking about how a player is 1 out of 10 players in a game they say I am over complicating it and they continue to speak about how your the only one who determines the end result of a game.

Everyone keeps telling me that I am ignorant and stubborn and told me to look up the definition of ignorant. So like everything I have ever been told to do and try on league gave the advice a go and looked it up:

Ignorance:
lack of knowledge or information

I give them knowledge and they say it is too complicated then they call me ignorant.
